The Cryptic Crossword: Sunday, October 2, 2022

Heart decal with top scraped off (6)

Type of Clue   Charades
Cryptic / Straight   Heart decal with top scraped off
Solution and Explanation

  TICKER (synonym of heart)


  • decal→ STICKER (synonym)
  • with top scraped off→ TICKER (remove the first letter)
